body_html:
I think the NumPy behavior here is better:

  1. Use an internal buffer if the outputs and inputs overlap
  2. Don't resize the output (use broadcasting rules)

(1) is already what we do for non-contiguous inputs and outputs
body_text:
I think the NumPy behavior here is better:

Use an internal buffer if the outputs and inputs overlap
Don't resize the output (use broadcasting rules)

(1) is already what we do for non-contiguous inputs and outputs
body:
I think the NumPy behavior here is better:
1) Use an internal buffer if the outputs and inputs overlap
2) Don't resize the output (use broadcasting rules)

(1) is already what we do for non-contiguous inputs and outputs
